    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83427</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Radiation d'alpha, de bêta et gamma à travers un champ  magnétique</string>
            <string language="en">Alpha, beta and gamma radiation through a magnetic field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alpha-, Beta- und gammastrahlung durch ein 
magnetisches fangen auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Radiação do alfa, a beta e a gamma através de 
um campo magnético</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Beta e radiazione gamma dell'alfa, attraverso un 
campo magnetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλφα, βήτα και ακτινοβολία γάμμα μέσω ενός 
μαγνητικού πεδίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Radiación de la alfa, beta y gamma a través de 
un campo magnético</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme compare ce qui arrive à la radiation alpha, bêta et gamma quand elles traversent un champ magnétique.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram compares what happens to alpha, beta and gamma radiation when they pass through a magnetic field.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayonnement d'alpha</string>
            <string language="en">alpha radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayonnements bêta</string>
            <string language="en">beta radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">particules chargées</string>
            <string language="en">charged particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">courant électrique</string>
            <string language="en">electric current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayonnement gamma</string>
            <string language="en">gamma radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">champ magnétique</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm vergleicht, was Alpha geschieht, 
Beta und gamma Strahlung, wenn sie durch ein magnetisches 
überschreiten, auffangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama compara o que acontece à 
radiação do alfa, a beta e a gamma quando passa através de um campo
magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema confronta che cosa accade beta ed a
radiazione gamma dell'alfa, quando attraversano un campo magnetico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα συγκρίνει τι συμβαίνει στην άλφα, 
βήτα και ακτινοβολία γάμμα όταν περνούν μέσω ενός μαγνητικού 
πεδίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama compara qué sucede a la radiación
de la alfa, beta y gamma cuando él pasa a través de un campo 
magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alphastrahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betastrahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">belastete Partikel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrischer Strom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gamma Strahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">radiação de alfa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">radiação beta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">partículas carregadas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corrente elétrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">radiação gamma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ακτινοβολία γάμμα</string>
